concept.title: The GemFire C# .NET API
concept.shortdesc: The GemFire C# .NET API is provided in the GemStone::GemFire::Cache::Generic namespace. This namespace allows you to manage your cache, regions, and data using the .NET Generics APIs.

conbody.p: Use the GemFire C# .NET API to programmatically create, populate, and manage a GemFire distributed system.
conbody.note: The C# .NET library is thread-safe except where otherwise indicated in the online API documentation.
conbody.p: For complete and current information on the GemFire APIs, see the online .NET API documentation. For information on .NET generics, see the MicroSoft ® developer’s network website.
